description: Key Features: High-definition and 120 degree viewing angle Built-in guideline for instant distance calculation New 7 infrared LED'S night vision Versatile compatibility can be connected to any type of monitor Waterproof and can be installed on your license plate Applicable to all type of vehicles. Easy installation and can be installed in several ways. Specifications: Image sensor: color CMOS Supports NTSC/PAL Video system Effective pixels: PAL: 628 X 582 pixels Horizontal resolutions: 420 TV lines Lens angle: 120 Degree Minimum illumination: 03 Lux, F=1.2 Video output: RCA connector, 1.0vP-P, 75ohm Power consumption: Less than150mA Power supply: DC12V Operating temperature: -20- 70 (Celsius degree) Storage temperature: -40- 80 (Celsius degree). What You Get: Waterproof car rear view camera(1 piece) Power cable(1 piece) Video cable(1 piece) User manual
title: Koolertron Rear View License Plate Backup CMOS Camera
